question: 源
sourceMnemonic: The <kanji>origin</kanji> is the <vocabulary>origin</vocabulary>, but it also refers to the <vocabulary>ground spring</vocabulary>s, where the origin of water comes from.
sourceReadingMnemonic: Since this word is made up of a single kanji, it probably uses the kun'yomi reading. You did not learn this reading, so here's a mnemonic to help you to remember: Think of how this <vocabulary>ground spring</vocabulary> is everyone's (<ja>皆</ja>) origin (<ja>元</ja>). Everyone can use it, it's the <ja>皆元</ja>!
